summary: Luxury watch e-commerce platform called 'Luxury In Times' with homepage, product listings, search/filters, shopping cart, and admin panel. Black/gold/white luxury design. Backend uses Internet Computer canisters (Motoko). Admin panel at /admin with password 'GRANTH'. Multiple photo upload system with up to 5 images per watch and product detail pages with image carousel/gallery.
architectural_notes: Backend: Motoko canisters on Internet Computer for product data storage
Frontend: React/TypeScript with luxury black/gold/white color palette
Contact page: New route at /contact displaying phone number +91 7572939000 with tel: link
Product images: Array of up to 5 image URLs per watch, first image is primary thumbnail
Product detail page: Dedicated route for each watch with image carousel/gallery
known_issues: "Failed to load products" error on products page - no sample watches seeded in backend yet
